## Service Solicitation
### RFP against Supply Arrangement
#### Following supply arrangement holders have been invited to propose:
|  Service Provider  |  Service Provider (Risk Information)
|  ---  |  ---
|  9149481 Canada Inc.; Tatkresiwok Community Solutions Inc. |  I.5 Information Management Architect
|  Adirondack Information Management Inc. |  I.5 Information Management Architect
|  ...
|  ( Full list of Service Providers )

## Detailed Description of the Solicitation
The Department of National Defence / Canadian Armed Forces (DND/CAF) invites interested service providers to bid on the requirement for a digitally enabled, customer-centric recruiting system that supports an efficient automated onboarding process.

Service providers will be selected based on a Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price. The contract will be awarded to the service provider that best meets the requirements outlined in the solicitation.

**Key Requirements**
- The system must support an efficient automated onboarding process
- Must support the recruitment of new military personnel
- The system must meet the security requirements of the Canadian Armed Forces
- The contract will run for 19 months from the date of award

**Service Provider Information**
The contracting authority can be contacted via the provided contact information for any questions or requests for clarification on the solicitation.

```markdown
# Contact Information
Name:    Director Comptroller Procurement and Material Management / Digital Services Group – Directeur finance Contrôleur Approvisionnement et Gestion du matériel / Groupe des services numériques
Email:   IMBIDS.OFFRESGI@forces.gc.ca
Phone:   343596483
```
